mapper.insert: insert into board( title, user_id, content, category_id ) values( #{title}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{categoryId} )
mapper.select: select board.id, title, user_id, content, date, category_id, views, recommand, user_name from board join user_tb on board.user_id = user_tb.id order by id desc
select board.id, title, user_id, content, date, category_id, views, recommand, user_name from board join user_tb on board.user_id = user_tb.id where board.id = #{id}
